content: both english and japanese versions are fully charted using standard knitting and/or crochet symbols **japanese version available here 1 ** calls for japanese size 5/0 crochet hook 3 0 mm no gauge is listed in the pattern although it says that the finished size is approx 8 cm per square yarn requirements * color 1 100 g approx 500 meters/ 545 yards * color 2 200 g approx 1000 meters/ 1090 yards * color 3 180 g approx 900 meters/ 981 yards * color 4 230 g approx 1150 meters/ 1253 5 yards * color 5 65 g approx 325 meters/ 354 25 yards **note ** entire blanket worked with yarn held double 1 http //item rakuten co jp/gosyo/27-28-577b/
